title: Morally Corrupt
description: She's an assassin. He's a policeman... And her husband. Bianca Ashby, a certified sociopath with an obsession for her husband, tries to juggle two lives - the demure NYPD Chief Commissioner wife, and the perfect Bratva assassin; all the while keeping her husband safe and blissfully unaware.But when high-level corruption and a personal vendetta raise the stakes, no one is who they say they are; least of all Biancaâ€™s perfectly dull husband, Theo.From glitzy New York ballrooms and charity events to underground sex rings, drugs, and illegal fights, the best pretender wins it all.Author's note: Morally Corrupt has been re-edited. The story remains the same.Morally Corrupt is a romantic thriller with elements of horror and gore. This is a dark book that explores questionable moral behaviors. Please read the triggers before proceeding.
author: Veronica Lancet
